00012 EagleDbSchema* EagleDbSchema_New(char *name)
00013 {
00014     EagleDbSchema *schema = (EagleDbSchema*) EagleMemory_Allocate("EagleDbSchema_New.1", sizeof(EagleDbSchema));
00015     if(NULL == schema) {
00016         return NULL;
00017     }
00018     
00019     schema->name = (NULL == name ? NULL : strdup(name));
00020     schema->tables = EagleLinkedList_New();
00021

00025 void EagleDbSchema_Delete(EagleDbSchema *schema)
00026 {
00027     if(NULL == schema) {
00028         return;
00029     }
00030     
00031     EagleLinkedList_DeleteWithItems(schema->tables);
00032     EagleMemory_Free(schema->name);
00033     EagleMemory_Free(schema);
00034 }

00036 EagleDbTableData* EagleDbSchema_getTable(EagleDbSchema *schema, const char *tableName)
00037 {
00038     EagleLinkedList_Foreach(schema->tables, EagleDbTableData*, table)
00039     {
00040         if(0 == strcmp(tableName, table->table->name)) {
00041             return table;
00042         }
00043     }
00044     EagleLinkedList_ForeachEnd
00045     
00046     return NULL;
00047 }
00048 
00049 EagleBoolean EagleDbSchema_addTable(EagleDbSchema *schema, EagleDbTableData *td)
00050 {
00051     /* check if the table already exists */
00052     if(NULL != EagleDbSchema_getTable(schema, td->table->name)) {
00053         char msg[1024];
00054         sprintf(msg, "Error: Table \"%s.%s\" already exists.", schema->name, td->table->name);
00055         EagleLogger_Log(EagleLoggerSeverityUserError, msg);
00056         return EagleFalse;
00057     }
00058     
00059     EagleLinkedList_addObject(schema->tables, td, EagleFalse, NULL);
00060     
00061     return EagleTrue;
00062 }
